attributes.action: support Donald Trump's scheme for investing in a world class Golf Center in Aberdeenshire that will bring employment and a host of opportunities to the North East of Scotland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This scheme has support of local people who see the longterm advantages to the North East in terms of employment for the new generation and the creation of a center of excellence in our community.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " support Donald Trump's scheme for investing in a world class Golf Center in Aberdeenshire that will bring employment and a host of opportunities to the North East of Scotland."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15258.asp

Prime Minister's Office
